text: Richard Hurst (fl. 1406) was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Melcombe Regis in 1406.http://www.historyofparliamentonline.org/volume/1386-1421/member/hurst- richard ==References== Category:14th-century births Category:15th-century deaths Category:English MPs 1406 Category:Members of the Parliament of England (pre-1707) for Melcombe Regis
title: Richard Hurst (MP)
